profile.title: Senior QA Engineer
profile.subTitle: AI Enthusiast | Data Scientist | Machine Learning Engineer
profile.aboutMe: With 11+ years in IT, I'm a seasoned Quality Assurance Engineer leveraging a deep foundation in software quality, testing methodologies, and system architecture. I am now strategically pivoting my extensive experience to master the Artificial Intelligence field, aiming to apply my quality-driven mindset to developing, testing, and ensuring the reliability of innovative AI systems.
profile.footnote: Dedicated to delivering exceptional AI software solutions that drive innovation and success.
